     stop thinking you should stop thinking about what should be, and accept the fact that you do think about what should be

5.3.17  10:07 am   Chocolate milk?

5.3.17  8:46 am   Are you worried about people who will try to correct you on your research?

     no. the more people try to 'correct' me, the more that shows me that i got the important part of the video right, which is to make it a wild and crazy video, causing people to seek revenge by trying to tell me it's wrong

5.3.17  7:37 am   When will you upload your sad page

     i don't have a sad page

5.3.17  6:54 am   why would you take people's demand for content so seriously and not seriously at all at the same time?

     i take it as a good sign, but there is no need to 'obey' it. my own demand for content is surely stronger anyway, and more guided in the direction i want to go

5.3.17  6:25 am   if I told you you've made a typo in one of your answers, would you go and fix it?

     usually yes

      and would the question where I told you about the typo get an answer?

     usually no, although i do appreciate it

5.3.17  6:12 am   How did the people come up with the solution to the quadratic equations?

     by drawing squares and thinking about them

5.3.17  6:11 am   Can you explain visual art,

     it's when you make stuff look cool

      music,

     it's when you make stuff sound cool

     physics,

     it's how stuff moves

     chemistry,

     it's how stuff tastes

      history,

     it's what happened, before

      nature,

     i think it means anything on earth that is not a result of the strange recent rapid advance of humans? although i don't think it's fair to exclude that

     politics

     how to convince the public you have perfect morals

      and grammar?

     it's how you build words, and sentences

5.3.17  4:49 am   okay, here's the situation. i am trying to listen to 1,000 albums of music this year. i am on track so far. i also want to release five album/ep's and i have each one planned. i am less on track with that, but it still seems feasible. at least, it was until today. today my piano teacher said I should be doing three hours of practice per day, and currently he has five jazz tunes (including one i have to transcribe) for me that I need to know inside out in a month, for an assessment. this would of course be doable and appropriately challenging under normal circumstances, but there is already so much going on, and i don't want to give up any of it. I'm already doing all but the bare minimum of schoolwork i am not passionate about (english, maths), and I don't play computer games or watch TV, but it just seems like there are not enough hours in the day. what is the best way to manage my time so that i can work on Multiple Projects even more swiftly and efficiently than I already am?

     i'm not sure why you need someone else to tell you to transcribe tunes. can't you just decide on your own which tunes to transcribe? better yet, if you already have it on your agenda to listen to albums, why not just transcribe the albums you are listening to instead? also if it is on your agenda to make multiple albums, that is valuable real life musical experience. i don't see why you need to 'practice' for so many hours outside of that. if the piano teacher you mentioned is not willing to work congruently with your already established agenda, then i think those 2 agendas will come into conflict, as you have surely noticed

5.3.17  4:27 am   Do you feel a lot of pressure to do the video

     yes but the only pressure that has any effect is the pressure i get from me

      and does it make makeing the video not fun?

     it helps it get done

5.2.17  11:27 pm   hi how are you

     good

      i hope you are okay
i really enjoyed your mindset towards creating and making stuff
but how do you stay emotionally invested in what you do, without burning out?

     i think i accidentally made a huge ridiculously large emotional downpayment, a long time ago

      thank you i hope you have a nice day and i hope the next time you eat breakfast it's a really good breakfast
like i had a really good breakfast today
and i figure like
that's one of the best things i can realistically wish people
so
i hope you have a great greakfast
like
super good

sorry for that tangent

     it's ok

      i'm gonna go now
bye


haveagreatbreakfast

5.2.17  11:17 pm   Is it okay if I have a job making music for other people?

     yes

     Shouldn't my goal be making music for myself?

     yes. there is a secret twist, which is that you can do both and keep them separate. kind of like getting a non-music job and keeping it separate, except your non-music job happens to take advantage of your music skills, even though it has nothing to do with your 'real' path. you may be surprised at how well this works. again, if you feel your own path is too important to be compromised, i am telling you there is a secret twist that you can keep them separate. i know it sounds crazy and i actually didn't expect it to work so well

5.2.17  10:55 pm   Are emotions irrational?

     it depends if they are in agreement with the Committee of Rationality

     no
